channel.title: INtopBackup

item.description: The driver, Silverio Villegas-Gonzales, was pronounced dead in hospital shortly after the incident.

item.title: BBC reports from house linked to Charlie Kirk shooting suspect

item.title: New Nato mission to bolster eastern flank after Russia drone incursion
item.description: Denmark, France and Germany will send jets to strengthen Poland's air defences after Russian drones flew into Polish territory.

item.title: 9/12: The Daily Report

item.title: Nigerian chef attempts to make world's largest pot of jollof rice
item.description: Hilda Baci and a team of assistants took several hours to complete the popular West African dish.

item.title: 5/12/2024: A Week in Israel; A Web of Intrigue
item.description: First, a report on Israel's fronts: Hamas, Hezbollah, Iran. And, a look at a Marine veteran’s work to help North Koreans.

item.title: 'I will never let your legacy die' - Charlie Kirk's widow gives tearful address after shooting
item.description: Erika Kirk vows to fight on against 'evil-doers' in her first statement since her husband's death.
